essences.name: Visage of the Living Ancients
essences.effect: Demoralize now calls on the power of an Ancient to charge toward you from a targeted location, bringing along any enemies in its path. Damage +18.0%

essences.name: Pot Metal
essences.effect: Demoralize becomes an Ancestral Protector, granting an absorb shield that makes you immune to knockback while active. Shield effect +10.8%

essences.name: Impending Slaughter
essences.effect: Demoralize replaced with an intimidating shout that damages enemies and reduces their attack/move speeds. Damage +18.0%

essences.name: Bestial Threat
essences.effect: Demoralize replaced with a terrifying roar that damages/Immobilizes nearby enemies. Damage +18.0%

essences.name: Heartless Terror
essences.effect: Demoralize unleashes a roar that damages enemies while making you immune to loss of control and knockbacks. Damage +18.0%

essences.name: Spartusk
essences.effect: Demoralize now pulls in all nearby enemies, dealing damage, Stunning them, and removing beneficial effects applied by Skills or Primaries. Damage +18.0%

essences.name: Yowl of Execration
essences.effect: Demoralize now knocks back and damages enemies; those knocked into walls are also Stunned. Damage +18.0%

essences.name: Battlemaster's Helm
essences.effect: Demoralize replaced with a war cry that increases all damage you and nearby allies inflict. Cooldown -7.2%

essences.name: Lion’s Mane
essences.effect: Demoralize also detonates DoTs on nearby enemies instantly. Demoralize Cooldown -3.6%

essences.name: Dishonored Blade
essences.effect: Demoralize duration increased by 39%.

essences.name: Burden of Nothingness (Latest)
essences.effect: Also grants a Demoralizing Aura for 3s, reducing nearby enemies’ damage by 19%.

essences.name: Spiritbreaker
essences.effect: Sprint also leaves tornadoes (7,650 dmg) in your path. Damage +90.0%

essences.name: Squirmskull
essences.effect: While Sprint is active, your Attack Speed increases by 28.5% and projectile speed by 40%.

essences.name: Second Breath
essences.effect: Sprint duration increased by 39%.

essences.name: Broken Grasp
essences.effect: Sprint also increases your Dodge Chance by 20%. Cooldown -3.6%.

essences.name: Hell’s Legacy
essences.effect: Sprint leaves a trail of flames dealing 19,040 dmg over 4s. Damage +90.0%

essences.name: Routfinder
essences.effect: Sprint leaves a wind tunnel letting allies pass through for +30% Move Speed (2s). Sprint Cooldown -3.6%.

essences.name: Juggernaut’s Plan
essences.effect: Sprint causes you to run continuously, knocking away and damaging enemies in your path. Sprint Damage increased by 18.0%.

essences.name: Swiftwing
essences.effect: Sprint also increases movement speed of nearby allies; Sprint Cooldown reduced by 7.2%.

essences.name: Grinning Effigy
essences.effect: Taking damage during Undying Rage triggers a 5,882 dmg counterattack (once per 0.5s). Damage +90.0%

essences.name: Ancestors’ Stele
essences.effect: Undying Rage duration +1 second, Cooldown -3.6%

essences.name: The Trembling
essences.effect: Undying Rage also increases your Movement Speed by 50%. Cooldown -3.6%

essences.name: Splitting Outbreak
essences.effect: +1 max charge for Ground Stomp, Cooldown -3.6%

essences.name: Weighted Brow
essences.effect: Ground Stomp range increased by 29%.

essences.name: Chitinous Greaves
essences.effect: Ground Stomp unleashes fury within you, Burning enemies. Ground Stomp Damageincreased by 18.0%.

essences.name: Rockspike
essences.effect: Ground Stomp now affects all nearby enemies. Ground Stomp Damage increased by 18.0%.

essences.name: Compromise Is Loss
essences.effect: Ground Stomp rips open the ground in front of you, dealing damage; max 2 charges. Ground Stomp Damage increased by 18.0%.

essences.name: Pit of Ursus
essences.effect: Smashes the ground to erect a ring of rocks, boosting your damage and reducing enemy damage inside; Ground Stomp Cooldown reduced by 7.2%.

essences.name: Indiscriminate Heat
essences.effect: Also causes lava to erupt after a short delay, damaging and Stunning enemies. Ground Stomp Damage +18.0%.

essences.name: Dauntless Temper
essences.effect: Calls on the power of an Ancient to appear and stomp periodically around you. Ground Stomp Damage +18.0%.

essences.name: Shattered Ground
essences.effect: Produces an earthquake damaging enemies in the area but no longer Stuns them. Ground Stomp Damage +18.0%.

essences.name: Horns of Harrogath
essences.effect: Slaying enemies during WotB increases your damage by 1% for 9.6s, up to 10%.

essences.name: Krubask’s Sneer
essences.effect: During WotB, your Critical Hit Chance is increased by 19%.

essences.name: Sullen Vow
essences.effect: WotB also increases your Primary Attack Speed by 30% for 5.7s.

essences.name: Lasting Hate
essences.effect: Wrath of the Berserker duration increased by 39%.

essences.name: Berserker’s Sanity
essences.effect: WotB now also dispels loss-of-control effects. Cooldown -3.6%

essences.name: Brace of Ancestors
essences.effect: WotB also causes your Primary Attack to deal 100% of its damage to nearby enemies. Cooldown -3.6%

essences.name: Broken Calling
essences.effect: WotB also makes you immune to knockback effects for 4.75s.

essences.name: Nature’s Temper
essences.effect: WotB causes Primary Attacks to consume 1% Life, dealing +13,601 damage each strike. Damage +90.0%

essences.name: Doom of the Cowed
essences.effect: Activating WotB immediately reduces nearby enemies’ Move Speed by 80% for 2s. WotB Cooldown -3.6%.

essences.name: Ramshackle Fight
essences.effect: During WotB, each Critical Hit reduces its cooldown by 0.6s, up to 3.6s total.

essences.name: The Coming Storm
essences.effect: WotB cooldown decreased by 18.6%.

essences.name: Loathsome Lamina
essences.effect: WotB also grants a 6s shield that absorbs 37,743 damage. Shield Effect +54.0%.

essences.name: Bergbreaker
essences.effect: Causes you to retaliate when attacked, dealing damage to nearby enemies. Damage +18.0%

essences.name: Falling Thunder
essences.effect: Also enrages you when near a Bleeding enemy, increasing your damage by 28.5%.

essences.name: Broken Soul
essences.effect: WotB now increases Critical Hit Chance instead of Attack Speed. WotB Cooldownreduced by 7.2%.

essences.name: Sundered Legacy
essences.effect: WotB now causes nearby enemies to Burn. WotB Damage +18.0%

essences.name: Skull Mill
essences.effect: WotB becomes a brawler’s rage: your Primary Attacks are punches; the 3rd punch grabs an enemy and throws them forward for AoE damage. WotB Damage +18.0%

essences.name: Scallop Shell Armor
essences.effect: HotA deals up to +76% additional damage the farther away enemies are.

essences.name: Umble Drape
essences.effect: When HotA hits an enemy, drop additional hammers (50% damage), once every 3s. Damage increased by 90.0%

essences.name: Davin's Legacy
essences.effect: +1 max charge for HotA; Hammer of the Ancients cooldown reduced by 3.6%.

essences.name: Renitent Rage
essences.effect: For each negative condition on an enemy, HotA damage +19% (up to +76%).

essences.name: Truss of Stolen Skin
essences.effect: After using HotA, gain +20% Attack Speed for 6.4 seconds.

essences.name: Cold Temper
essences.effect: Shatters Frozen enemies for 34,512 extra damage, applying Chill. Damage increased by 90.0%.

essences.name: Luring Club
essences.effect: Hammer of the Ancients deals +66.5% damage vs. Stunned enemies.

essences.name: Ragecaller
essences.effect: HotA becomes electrified, slowing enemies by 50% for 3.2s.

essences.name: Stonefall
essences.effect: HotA Damage +19%

essences.name: The Last Wail
essences.effect: HotA smashes the ground, leaving an unstable area that erupts for extra damage after a delay. Damage +18.0%

essences.name: Clattersteel
essences.effect: Rains hammers from the sky at your location, damaging enemies within the area. Damage +18.0%

essences.name: Paste and Powder
essences.effect: Randomly drops hammers multiple times in the targeted area. Damage +18.0%

essences.name: Razorgrip
essences.effect: Can be charged for more range/damage; deals +50% vs. Stunned foes. Damage +18.0%

essences.name: Peace and Quietus
essences.effect: HotA can be dropped at a targeted spot; when reactivated, you and the hammer rush together—gathering enemies in between. Damage +18.0%

essences.name: Bonegyre
essences.effect: HotA now orbits you for several seconds, damaging enemies it passes through. Damage +18.0%

essences.name: Flickertonne
essences.effect: Each of your other attacks charges HotA, increasing its damage/radius on use. Damage +18.0%

essences.name: Breaker’s Wheel
essences.effect: HotA creates a barrier of earth, preventing enemies from entering or exiting the strike zone. Damage +18.0%

essences.name: Beggar’s Mallet
essences.effect: Throws a whirling hammer that returns to you, damaging enemies in its path. Damage +18.0%

essences.name: The Forgotten
essences.effect: Throws a giant hammer that knocks enemies away; picking it up reduces HotA’s remaining cooldown. Damage +18.0%

essences.name: The Remembered
essences.effect: Summons a Spirit of the Ancients who stuns nearby enemies on arrival and fights alongside you. Damage +18.0%

essences.name: The Startler
essences.effect: HotA strikes the ground multiple times, knocking enemies airborne. Movement speed is reduced while striking. Damage +18.0%

essences.name: Direct Diplomacy
essences.effect: Grab shatters the enemy’s armor, causing them to take +19% damage for 3s.

essences.name: The Hewer
essences.effect: Grab now causes you to charge forward and seize the first enemy you hit, carrying them before leaping and slamming them down—damaging and Slowing nearby enemies. You’re immune to loss-of-control and knockback during the skill. Grab Damage +18.0%

essences.name: Crumblestall
essences.effect: Grab calls an Ancestral Spirit to hurl a giant mountain at a target location, damaging and Stunning enemies. Grab Damage +18.0%

essences.name: Strangle Wings
essences.effect: Grab now targets an enemy and dashes toward them, seizing and continuing the dash—knocking back other foes. Stuns if you hit a wall. Grab Damage +18.0%

essences.name: Temple of Battle
essences.effect: Sweeps spears from left/right, gathering enemies in a cluster in front of you. Chained Spear damage +18.0%.

essences.name: Impaler’s Breath
essences.effect: Hurls 3 harpoons that knock enemies away and Stun them. Damage +18.0%.

essences.name: Hearth Hook
essences.effect: Now throws a piercing spear that applies a stacking Bleed. Damage +18.0%.

essences.name: Cracklefell
essences.effect: Hurls 3 electrified spears that damage and immobilize enemies. Damage +18.0%.

essences.name: Charred Iron
essences.effect: Hurls 3 flaming spears, each leaving a burning trail. Damage +18.0%.

essences.name: Crusher Rig
essences.effect: Hurls giant rocks, damaging all enemies in their path. Chained Spear Damage +18.0%.

essences.name: Scalesunder
essences.effect: Chained Spear also shatters armor, increasing all damage enemies take by 8% for 4.8 seconds.

essences.name: Buried Talons
essences.effect: Chained Spear also increases your damage by 19% for 3 seconds.

essences.name: Tempo Change
essences.effect: +1 max charge for Chained Spear; Chained Spear Cooldown reduced by 3.6%.

essences.name: Steel Lamprey
essences.effect: Chained Spear marks enemies for 5s and heals you for 5% of damage caused to marked enemies.

essences.name: Obin’s Many Fingers
essences.effect: Chained Spear hurls 2 additional spears. Cooldown reduced by 3.6%.

essences.name: Manifold Gore
essences.effect: Whirlwind damage +19% per Bleed on the enemy, up to +57%.

essences.name: Ferocious Gale
essences.effect: Whirlwind occasionally spawns tornadoes (8,415 dmg). Damage increased by 90.0%

essences.name: The Gathering
essences.effect: Whirlwind pulls in all enemies it hits. Whirlwind Energy Consumption -3.6%.

essences.name: Five Fresh Claws
essences.effect: Whirlwind shreds armor, +2% damage taken per hit (stack up to 5x). Whirlwind Energy Consumption -3.6%.

essences.name: Indignant Survivor
essences.effect: Each time you’re attacked, Whirlwind’s Critical Hit Chance +12% for 2s (up to +36%).

essences.name: Weight of War
essences.effect: Whirlwind makes enemies more vulnerable, increasing Crit Chance against them by 4.8% for 3s, up to 24%.

essences.name: Ox’s Horns
essences.effect: Striking the same enemy 3 times with Whirlwind causes them to Bleed for 18,936 dmg/s over 2.5s. Damage +90.0%.

essences.name: Lonecastle
essences.effect: +50% chance to block projectiles during Whirlwind; Whirlwind Energy Consumption -3.6%.

essences.name: Wreckfall
essences.effect: Whirlwind reduces all damage you take by 20% while channeling. Whirlwind Energy Consumption -3.6%.

essences.name: Ydama’s Cyclone
essences.effect: Whirlwind damage increased by 19%.

essences.name: Pathraze
essences.effect: Whirlwind now lets you spin and charge forward, damaging all enemies in your path. Max 3 charges. Whirlwind Damage +18.0%

essences.name: Eager Maelstrom
essences.effect: Whirlwind radius increased; Whirlwind movement speed decreased. Whirlwind Damage +18.0%

essences.name: Fallow Field
essences.effect: Whirlwind consumes Life instead of Energy, letting you spin as long as you have HP. Whirlwind Damage +18.0%

essences.name: Widespread Blame
essences.effect: Whirlwind now shatters armor and gains significantly increased Attack Speed. Whirlwind Damage +18.0%

essences.name: North Wind
essences.effect: Whirlwind also inflicts a stacking Chill. Whirlwind Damage +18.0%

essences.name: Bitterwind
essences.effect: Whirlwind draws on the wind for increased damage without reducing your Movement Speed. Whirlwind Damage +18.0%

essences.name: Tracker's Rage
essences.effect: All damage you deal is increased by +19% after activating Furious Charge.

essences.name: Armor Caste
essences.effect: Creates shock waves when colliding with walls, dealing 8,500 dmg and Stunning enemies for 1s. Damage increased by 90.0%.

essences.name: Lumber-cords
essences.effect: Decreases all damage you take by 5% for 3s per enemy hit, stacking up to 6 times. Furious Charge Cooldown -3.6%.

essences.name: Death Awaits
essences.effect: Also shatters enemies’ armor, increasing damage they take by 19% for 3s.

essences.name: Widow in Waiting
essences.effect: Furious Charge now also reduces enemies’ Movement Speed by 50% for 6.4s.

essences.name: Determination
essences.effect: Furious Charge can now be charged to increase its range and damage. Furious Charge Damage increased by 18.0%.

essences.name: Ram’s Impasse
essences.effect: Furious Charge drags enemies with you, Stunning them. Furious Charge Damageincreased by 18.0%.

essences.name: Crown’s Cowardice (Latest)
essences.effect: Furious Charge now dashes to a targeted enemy, damaging and Stunning all nearby enemies. Furious Charge Damage increased by 18.0%.

essences.name: Screaming Fury
essences.effect: Furious Charge goes to a location, knocking enemies into the air; max 2 charges. Furious Charge Damage +18.0%.

essences.name: Silver Flash
essences.effect: Cleave’s knockback can now affect enemy players (once every 2s). Cleave Cooldownreduced by 3.6%.

essences.name: Dread Desecration
essences.effect: Cleave can be used while suffering loss of control or knockback effects, and grants brief immunity to those effects. Cleave Cooldown -3.6%.

essences.name: Law of the Wild
essences.effect: Cleave deals +47.5% damage to Slowed enemies.

essences.name: Writhing Mantle
essences.effect: Cleave damage +29% vs. Chilled enemies, +50% vs. Frozen.

essences.name: Skull Motte
essences.effect: Cleave tears armor, increasing damage enemies take by 11.4% for 3s, up to 34.2%.

essences.name: Bloodguzzle
essences.effect: Each time Cleave hits an enemy within 2s, it gains +19% damage vs. that enemy, up to +57%.

essences.name: Hatred’s Reach
essences.effect: Cleave range increased by 29%.

essences.name: Drop by Drop
essences.effect: Cleave’s Bleed now spreads to 2 nearby enemies when it expires. Cleave Cooldown -3.6%.

essences.name: Borrowed Might
essences.effect: Cleave periodically conjures a Spirit of the Ancient to cleave through nearby enemies. Cleave Damage +18.0%

essences.name: Svot’s Reach
essences.effect: Cleave now strikes in a full circle around you. Cleave Damage +18.0%

essences.name: Axe of the Ray
essences.effect: Cleave now hurls two whirling axes to damage enemies. Cleave Damage +18.0%

essences.name: Decollater
essences.effect: Cleave becomes a 3-attack sequence (Bleed + knockup) without multiple charges. Cleave Damage +18.0%

essences.name: Frigid Grin
essences.effect: Cleave summons twin rime axes orbiting you, damaging and freezing Chilled enemies. Cleave Damage +18.0%

essences.name: Shardbreaker
essences.effect: Cleave now causes you to Dash forward, slicing all enemies in your path. Cleave Damage +18.0%

essences.name: Lurker’s Last Chance
essences.effect: Cleave becomes channeled, repeatedly damaging all enemies in front of you. Cleave Damage +18.0%

essences.name: Virulent Fist
essences.effect: Enemies killed by Cleave explode, dealing 8,925 damage to nearby enemies. Damage +90.0%

essences.name: Flesh Splitter
essences.effect: Cleave damage increased by 19%.

essences.name: Animal Instinct
essences.effect: Leap can be charged to increase range/damage. Leap Damage +18.0%.

essences.name: Shocking Chaos
essences.effect: Leap is electrified, Stunning all nearby enemies on landing. Leap Damage +18.0%.

essences.name: Kar’s Defiance
essences.effect: Leap grants a 37,683-damage shield and knockback immunity while active. Shield Effectincreased by 54.0%.

essences.name: Cliff Divers
essences.effect: Activating Leap increases your Critical Hit Chance by 19% for 3 seconds.

essences.name: Plummet Proudly
essences.effect: Leap also increases your Attack Speed by 28.5% for 3 seconds.

essences.name: Howler’s Lift
essences.effect: Leap damage increased by 19%.

essences.name: Metal o’ Mine
essences.effect: After using Leap, your damage is increased by 19% for 4 seconds.

essences.name: Haughty Behemoth
essences.effect: Leap now knocks enemies into the air when landing. Leap Cooldown -3.6%.

essences.name: Flattener
essences.effect: Max charges of Leap +1; Leap Cooldown -3.6%.

essences.name: Selleina’s Iron
essences.effect: Leap causes the ground to shake for 3s, dealing 22,752 total damage to enemies in the area. Damage +90.0%

essences.name: Trail of Mourning
essences.effect: Sunder now also pulls enemies to you. Sunder Cooldown reduced by 3.6%.

essences.name: Rending Bite
essences.effect: Lacerate inflicts a Bleeding of 28,856 damage over 3s. Damage +90.0%

essences.name: Ardent Fervor
essences.effect: Lacerate’s Attack Speed +15% for 3.2s each time you take damage, stacking to +45%.

essences.name: Lunatic Twin
essences.effect: When Frenzy is fully stacked, each attack unleashes 9,792 damage to all enemies in front of you (0.4s cooldown). Damage +90.0%

essences.name: The Maddening
essences.effect: Movement Speed +15% while Frenzy is at max stacks. Frenzy Damage +9.0%

essences.name: Riddlerue
essences.effect: When Frenzy Crits, your Attack Speed is +50% for 3.2s.

sets.effect: Increases all continual, channeled, and persistent ground damage by 15%.
Each time you deal damage, you have a chance to unleash a lightning strike, dealing AoE damage and stunning enemies.
AoE explosion around your dash target, dealing heavy damage.
Inflicting crowd control effects on enemies triggers a damaging AoE explosion.
Increases gold find in areas by 50%.
Frozen enemies explode upon death, dealing AoE damage.
Flaming allies periodically explode, dealing heavy AoE damage.
Primary Attacks have a 5% chance to increase your Attack Speed for 10 seconds.

gems.effect: Primary Attack speed increased by 5.50%
Increases the speed of your Primary Attack by 16% and the damage of your Primary Attack by 2%.
Primary Attacks and movement charge electricity, releasing 90% base damage + 1134 chain lightning

Your Primary Attacks and movement slowly charge you with electricity. When fully charged, your next Primary Attack will release chain lightning, dealing 180% base damage + 1,800 to nearby enemies. Additionally, you gain a 12% increased chance to critically strike while fully charged.
Primary Attack forces non-Elite monsters to attack you for 2.00 seconds
Your Primary Attack forces non-Elite monsters it hits to attack you for 2 seconds. Additionally, you take 2% reduced damage from monsters affected by Mocking Laughter.
Alternates states every 9s: Power increases Primary Attack damage by 8.00%, Command increases skill damage by 8.00%

Alternates states every 9 seconds. Power increases your Primary Attack damage by 16%. Command increases all other skill damage by 16%. Additionally, you gain 6% increased Movement Speed while either state is active.
Primary Attacks and movement charge electricity, releasing 90% base damage + 1134 chain lightning
Primary Attacks and movement charge electricity, releasing 90% base damage + 1134 chain lightning
Alternates states every 9s: Power increases Primary Attack damage by 8.00%, Command increases skill damage by 8.00%
10% chance on Primary Attack to summon spirit wolf dealing 150% base damage + 1,458
Primary Attacks have a 20% chance to summon a spirit wolf that deals 240% base damage to all enemies in its path. Additionally, the spirit wolf howls, increasing your damage by 10% for 6 seconds.
Primary Attacks and movement charge electricity, releasing 90% base damage + 1134 chain lightning

Taking damage while below 50% Life causes Spiteful Blood to surge through you for 4 seconds, increasing your damage done by 30% and making you invulnerable to Primary Attacks from other players. Additionally, when Spiteful Blood triggers, you gain an absorb shield equal to 160% of your base damage. This effect cannot occur more often than once every 20 seconds.
Primary Attack unleashes Aspect of Gloom for 6s, triggering gloom blades dealing 30% base damage + 275
Your Primary Attacks unleash an Aspect of Gloom that lasts 10 seconds, during which your Primary Attacks deal 60% additional AoE damage.

enchantments.effect: Primary Attacks chance to reduce enemy Attack and Movement Speeds by 20% for 3s

sets.effect: Each time you defeat an enemy, you gain 30% increased Movement Speed for 2 seconds.
Damage dealt increased by 2.5% for every 5% increase in your Movement Speed, up to 25%.
Movement Speed bonuses can now stack 10 times, further increasing damage per stack.
Gain Thousand Winds, increasing your Movement Speed by 15%. Thousand Winds deactivates if you take damage.

gems.effect: Increases the duration of beneficial effects on you by 12% and increases your Movement Speed by 8% for 3 seconds after gaining a beneficial effect.
Up to 8% increased damage at full life (min 4% at low life), +10% Movement Speed

Increases all damage you deal by up to 32% and your Movement Speed by 20%. The damage bonus decreases as your Life decreases, but the minimum bonus is 16%. Additionally, your attacks heal you for 2% of damage dealt while the bonus is active.

Alternates states every 9 seconds. Power increases your Primary Attack damage by 16%. Command increases all other skill damage by 16%. Additionally, you gain 6% increased Movement Speed while either state is active.
Heal 120% base damage + 1,200 Life each time you defeat an enemy. Additionally, while above 75% Life, you gain a 10% Movement Speed bonus.
Using a buff increases target's damage and movement speed by 8% for 6s
Using skills to grant buffs increases damage done and Movement Speed of the target by 12% for 8 seconds. Additionally, the duration of all buffs on you is increased by 4 seconds.
15% chance to curse enemies, reducing Attack and Movement Speeds by 35% for 2.50 seconds
Your attacks have a 30% chance to curse enemies, reducing their Attack and Movement Speeds by 50% for 4 seconds. Additionally, cursed enemies take 12% increased damage from all sources.

Your attacks deal 6% increased damage for every 2 yards between you and the enemy hit, up to a maximum of 24% at 8 yards. Additionally, your attacks have a 1.2% chance to decrease enemy Attack and Movement Speed by 35% for 2 seconds.
Dealing damage increases your Attack Speed by 0.8% for 3 seconds, stacking up to 10 times. While at full stacks, your Movement Speed is increased by 9%.
Dealing damage increases your Attack Speed by 2.4% for 3 seconds, stacking up to 10 times. While at full stacks, your Movement Speed is increased by 12%.
15% chance to curse enemies, reducing Attack and Movement Speeds by 35% for 2.50 seconds
Prevents fatal damage and grants a shield absorbing 800% base damage for 10 seconds. Additionally, while the shield is active, your Movement Speed is increased by 20%.
Up to 8% increased damage at full life (min 4% at low life), +10% Movement Speed
Dealing damage increases your Attack Speed by 0.8% for 3 seconds, stacking up to 10 times. While at full stacks, your Movement Speed is increased by 9%.

sets.effect: Critical Hit Chance increased by 3% for each of your summons, up to a maximum of 18%.
Your summons enter a frenzied state, increasing their Attack Speed by 60% for 10 seconds when they critically hit.
Summons flaming allies that attack nearby enemies periodically.
Increases damage dealt while summons are active.

gems.effect: Increases all damage you deal by 16%, but also increases all damage you take by 5%. Additionally, your Critical Hit Chance is increased by 2%.
Gain 8.00% increased Critical Hit Chance when attacking from behind
Critical hits cause agony: 10% base damage + 122/sec for 6s

Your critical hits inflict agony, dealing 16.7% base damage + 202 every second for 3 seconds. Each enemy cannot be affected by this more often than once every 6 seconds. Additionally, you gain 6% increased attack speed while any enemy is suffering from your agony.

When you deal damage, you have a 20% chance to gain Maternal Disdain, increasing your Critical Hit Chance by 12% for 6 seconds. This effect cannot occur more often than once every 20 seconds. When Maternal Disdain ends, you release a blood spike toward nearby enemies, dealing base damage and causing them to Bleed.

Taking damage while below 50% Life causes Maternal Disdain, increasing your Critical Hit Chance by 20% for 6 seconds. When Maternal Disdain ends, you release a blood spike toward nearby enemies, dealing 300% base damage and causing them to Bleed for 50% base damage over 5 seconds.

Your critical hits have a 30% chance to call down meteorites, dealing 400% base damage to all enemies in the area. Additionally, the meteorites leave burning ground that deals 50% base damage per second for 5 seconds.
Gain 8.00% increased Critical Hit Chance when attacking from behind
Gain 8.00% increased Critical Hit Chance when attacking from behind
Gain 24% increased Critical Hit Chance when attacking from behind. Additionally, you deal 4% increased damage while attacking from behind.
Dealing damage increases your Critical Hit Chance by 16% for 6 seconds. Additionally, critical hits deal 20% more damage while Roiling Consequence is active.
Duration of beneficial effects increased by 8.00%
Increases the duration of beneficial effects on you by 12% and increases your Movement Speed by 8% for 3 seconds after gaining a beneficial effect.
Primary Attack speed increased by 5.50%

Your critical hits inflict agony, dealing 16.7% base damage + 202 every second for 3 seconds. Each enemy cannot be affected by this more often than once every 6 seconds. Additionally, you gain 6% increased attack speed while any enemy is suffering from your agony.
Your attacks poison enemies, dealing 32% base damage + 480 every second for 6 seconds. Additionally, poisoned enemies have their Attack Speed reduced by 10%.
Dealing damage increases your Attack Speed by 0.8% for 3 seconds, stacking up to 10 times. While at full stacks, your Movement Speed is increased by 9%.
